LABEL: 0x25E
STRING: My name is Metarou.

LABEL: 0x2A1
STRING: %ZI'm just a normal second year student attending a private high school.

LABEL: 0x304
STRING: I don't have any particular skills, and my grades are merely average. I'm one of those people who're lacking in personality and individuality.

LABEL: 0x387
STRING: Speaking of which, right now my classmates are racking their heads over their career paths after graduation.

LABEL: 0x3F6
STRING: We're still second years though. I think it's a bit early to be thinking about our future...

LABEL: 0x46B
STRING: Everyone's studying seriously, and no one is stupid enough to do anything to stand out from the crowd because they're worried about getting a black mark on their school report.

LABEL: 0x4F4
STRING: I'm the same, but I don't think there's any point in thinking about the future.

LABEL: 0x573
STRING: Anyways I don't even know where to begin to think about the future. Therefore, I'll just live each day as it comes.

LABEL: 0x5DA
STRING: Today, tomorrow, and certainly... in the years ahead.

LABEL: 0x675
STRING: Before entering the school building, I glanced at the flower bed to my side.

LABEL: 0x6D4
STRING: It's kind of a habit I've always had. Cause I feel like that person's always there.

LABEL: 0x737
STRING: ...Huh, you're not here today?

LABEL: 0x7CE
STRING: As usual, the flowerbeds are filled with a huge amount of pink flowers.

LABEL: 0x833
STRING: Thanks to that person's constant tending, they're looking good today too.

LABEL: 0x898
STRING: I don't like to tinker with the soil, so I could never do what they do.

LABEL: 0x911
STRING: While thinking of such things, I found someone who was curled up in a small huddle like a pillbug.

LABEL: 0x994
STRING: ...Ah, so you were here after all. You're done with watering today, aren't you?

LABEL: 0x9F5
STRING: The one crouched in the corner of the flower bed is... her.

LABEL: 0xB45
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xB53
STRING: "Ah...! Good morning, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0xC27
STRING: When she noticed my presence, she gave me a cheerful smile.

LIST.STRING: What are you doing over here?
Have you finished taking care of the flowers?

LABEL: 0xD84
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xD92
STRING: "Well, I'm done watering already! I was just looking at Mr. Ant carrying food to their nest."

LABEL: 0xE97
STRING: She says that and loosens her mouth into a giggle. Ahhhh, that's so silly...

LABEL: 0xF02
STRING: If she didn't act so childish, she would just be plain cute. ...Such a silly thought popped into my head.

LABEL: 0x1025
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1033
STRING: "Rhododendron flowers have five petals and they have such a beautiful pink colour. Aren't they cute?"

LABEL: 0x11DC
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x11EA
STRING: "Um... what do they mean again in the language of flowers? Do you know, Metarou-kun? I forgot."

LABEL: 0x12FB
STRING: She was absentmindedly muttering something incomprehensible again, so I tapped her lightly on the head as usual.

LABEL: 0x14AC
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x14BA
STRING: "Uu, it hurts!"

LABEL: 0x1625
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1633
STRING: "Auu... Metarou-kun, what are you doing〜? That's mean!"

LABEL: 0x1727
STRING: This girl holding her head and pouting is... Sycoe%R(4,Saiko).

LABEL: 0x178E
STRING: Her name is a combination of the words "calamity" and "child."

LABEL: 0x17DB
STRING: What an ominous name... I'd like to see the faces of the parents who gave her this name.

LABEL: 0x1848
STRING: ...Well that's what I thought at first, but I'm used to it now.

LABEL: 0x189F
STRING: I've been seeing her since the school year started.

LABEL: 0x18EE
STRING: It was a day just like today. I was watching her watering the flowers in the flowerbed when she suddenly called out to me.

LABEL: 0x1A5F
STRING: That day I arrived at school earlier than usual.

LABEL: 0x1AB0
STRING: One of the girls was watering the flowers in the flowerbed near the school gate.

LABEL: 0x1B13
STRING: She was all alone, holding a watering can in her hand, but she had a happy expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x1B86
STRING: There were no flowers in the flowerbed. I'm sure they've only just been planted.

LABEL: 0x1BEF
STRING: A small rainbow was formed by the water coming out of the watering can, sparkling and shining in seven colours.

LABEL: 0x1C70
STRING: She waters the seeds, not knowing when they will grow, and is excited about the day when they will finally bloom.

LABEL: 0x1D09
STRING: ...I can't help but stop and take in the scene.

LABEL: 0x1E0F
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1E1D
STRING: "Um, flowers... Do you like them?"

LABEL: 0x1EFF
STRING: Ah, this is bad. I didn't mean to get involved, but she approached me...

LABEL: 0x1F72
STRING: I don't really want to get involved with people, so I gave a curt reply, "No, not really..."

LABEL: 0x1FEF
STRING: For some reason, she smiled when she heard that.

LABEL: 0x214B
STRING: It must have been a few months since that day.

LABEL: 0x219E
STRING: I'm not in a romantic relationship with Sycoe, we're simply friends.

LABEL: 0x220D
STRING: I just help her water the flowers every morning, that's all.

LABEL: 0x2268
STRING: When I asked her why she was taking care of the flowerbeds in the school building when she wasn't in charge of them, she said it was a kind of volunteer work.

LABEL: 0x22FF
STRING: "You know, we have a big flowerbed, but not a single flower was blooming, so I felt sorry for it..."

LABEL: 0x2384
STRING: "I wanted to do it, so I asked the teacher if I could do it."

LABEL: 0x23E7
STRING: I guess even a clumsy girl like her wants to be of use to someone.

LABEL: 0x24E3
STRING: I'm still trying to figure out what this girl is thinking.

LABEL: 0x2544
STRING: So, I wanted to know... just out of curiosity. Somehow or another, I ended up coming here every morning to check on her.

LABEL: 0x2671
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x267F
STRING: "...Eheh. I've got to stop spacing out like that."

LABEL: 0x2810
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x281E
STRING: "I've got to be careful not to get caught off guard by Metarou-kun again...!"

LABEL: 0x291F
STRING: Sycoe seemed to be reflecting earnestly on her habit of going away into her own world.

LABEL: 0x297E
STRING: You don't have to react like that every time. I'm just teasing you.

LABEL: 0x29F7
STRING: That's how clumsy and silly she is. So she often gets teased by her classmates.

LABEL: 0x2A82
STRING: She herself seemed to admit that it was not "bullying", but just "teasing".

LABEL: 0x2B09
STRING: While the two of us were making small talk, the chime rang.

LABEL: 0x2B6E
STRING: Oops, homeroom's about to start already. Let's hurry to class.

LABEL: 0x2C52
STRING: As I walked in the doorway and changed my shoes, I heard a rustling sound from behind me, like a stack of paper falling.

LABEL: 0x2D5A
STRING: When I turned around, I saw that a large number of letters had fallen at Sycoe's feet.

LABEL: 0x2DB4
STRING: Picking up one of them, she opens it and reads it.

LIST.STRING: You're quite the popular girl, aren't you?

LABEL: 0x2EF7
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2F05
STRING: "'If you are reading this, you will be cursed with misfortune if you do not send this letter to ten other people within a week'..., it says."

LABEL: 0x3036
STRING: ...Why, it's just a chain letter. It's a common prank.

LABEL: 0x313D
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x314B
STRING: "Metarou-kun, what is this...? Will I be unhappy if I don't send it...?"

LABEL: 0x3254
STRING: It's not, don't take it seriously. It's just a common prank, I replied and she breathed a sigh of relief.

LABEL: 0x3383
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3391
STRING: "I-I thought so〜. Thank goodness... I thought I was really going to be cursed with misfortune."

LABEL: 0x353E
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x354C
STRING: "Ah...! M-more importantly, we gotta head to class quickly〜!"

LABEL: 0x363F
STRING: She's right. Class is about to start.

LABEL: 0x369C
STRING: We hurried to the classroom.

LABEL: 0x3805
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3813
STRING: "Hyaa!!!"

LABEL: 0x38DA
STRING: Behind me, there was suddenly a loud "bang" that echoed through the corridor.

LABEL: 0x3947
STRING: When I turned around, I saw that the Sycoe had tripped with all her might.

LABEL: 0x399C
STRING: Sigh, again? This is quite a grandiose way of tripping over yourself. ...Er, Are you alright?

LABEL: 0x3A97
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3AA5
STRING: "Owwwww... Uuu, I tripped over nothing again."

LABEL: 0x3BA0
STRING: She looks like she's having a hard time getting up, so I had no choice but to lend her a hand.

LABEL: 0x3CA1
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3CAF
STRING: "Th-thanks... Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x3D8C
STRING: When Sycoe lifted the hem of her skirt, she saw that her knee was bleeding a little.

LABEL: 0x3E9D
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3EAB
STRING: "Auuu, I scraped my knee. It hurts..."

LABEL: 0x3F9E
STRING: It's more than what you'd call a scrape. The sooner we get you some proper medical attention, the better.

LABEL: 0x40B3
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x40C1
STRING: "...Aha, I'm really unlucky, aren't I?"

LABEL: 0x41B1
STRING: She smiled weakly as she brushed the dust from her bottom.

LABEL: 0x420E
STRING: How can you keep a smile on your face in this situation...?

LABEL: 0x426B
STRING: I'd be crying if I were you, your knees look like you just came out of a car accident.

LABEL: 0x42CD
STRING: Whether she's oblivious or toughing it out... Sheesh, that level of toughness is something I've got to respect.

LIST.STRING: Should I take you to the infirmary?

LABEL: 0x4442
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4450
STRING: "Eh, Eheh. Sorry..."

LABEL: 0x45C5
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x45D3
STRING: "I'm causing trouble for Metarou-kun again."

LABEL: 0x4762
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4770
STRING: "No, I can go by myself. ...I-it's okay. I'm sorry I worried you and always causing you trouble... I'm really sorry."

LABEL: 0x48D8
STRING: Sycoe seemed depressed with her shoulders slumped. So I patted her on the head, ruffling her hair.

LABEL: 0x49F5
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4A03
STRING: "Wah, you can't, Metarou-kun. I just did my hairbuns〜"

LABEL: 0x4AFC
STRING: I continued to pat her head, without worrying that her hairbuns were coming loose.

LABEL: 0x4C03
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4C11
STRING: "Aha, hehehehe. It tickles〜"

LABEL: 0x4CF0
STRING: Sycoe is happy, and her mouth breaks into a grin.

LABEL: 0x4D4D
STRING: ...Well, despite her protests, it seems like she can't get enough of these headpats either.

LABEL: 0x4E56
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4F2D
STRING: I took her arm, and headed to the infirmary while supporting her body.

LABEL: 0x4F92
STRING: Because there's no way I can leave her like this as if nothing had happened.

LABEL: 0x4FF5
STRING: I signaled for her to go, and she nodded, her eyes slightly damp.

LABEL: 0x50F2
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5100
STRING: "...Metarou-kun, you know..."

LABEL: 0x51D5
STRING: I think I see a little bit of redness on Sycoe's cheeks.

LABEL: 0x52D4
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x52E2
STRING: "Thank you... for always saving me."

LIST.STRING: It's fine, don't worry about it.
I can't leave you alone with those injuries.

LABEL: 0x5423
STRING: I replied curtly.

LABEL: 0x550C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x551A
STRING: "Today's not my lucky day as well..."

LABEL: 0x55F3
STRING: ...Yes.

LABEL: 0x562A
STRING: To tell the truth... Sycoe is quite the unfortunate girl.

LABEL: 0x567D
STRING: She's unlucky from head to toe. She's never been lucky in anything she does.

LABEL: 0x56EA
STRING: I think "ill-fated" describes her better than merely "unlucky." It's to the point that you can't believe it's real.

LABEL: 0x576B
STRING: I thought it was just a matter of getting injured a lot or having unfortunate things occurring... mere screw-ups. But it's apparently more than that.

LABEL: 0x57FA
STRING: Her bad luck doesn't just affect herself, but everyone around her as well.

LABEL: 0x585F
STRING: According to Sycoe, she was already like this as far back as she could remember.

LABEL: 0x58CC
STRING: I didn't think this was possible, but the longer I was involved with her, the more... I believed.

LABEL: 0x5951
STRING: I'm getting worried about Sycoe, I feel sorry for her, it seems so painful.

LABEL: 0x59C4
STRING: Because it would be too painful for her to bear it alone.

LABEL: 0x5A17
STRING: I wish I could protect her from all these calamities.

LABEL: 0x5A76
STRING: So... feeling this way, I'm watching over her.

LABEL: 0x5D2F
STRING: ─After school.

LABEL: 0x5D6A
STRING: Today's classes were over and I was getting ready to leave when some people approached me.

LABEL: 0x5E76
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x5E84
STRING: "Yahoo, yahoo, thanks for waiting〜 Metarou, are you ready?"

LABEL: 0x6027
STRING: I looked up and saw a couple.

LABEL: 0x6120
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x612E
STRING: "Yo, Metarou. You look as dull as ever today."

LABEL: 0x6228
STRING: These guys are my childhood friends, Yukimaru and Nana. They're going out.

LABEL: 0x628F
STRING: Hmm? Um...

LABEL: 0x62CC
STRING: What did you two come over to call me for?

LABEL: 0x63BB
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x63C9
STRING: "The three of us were supposed to go karaoke after school today, right?"

LABEL: 0x64BF
STRING: Ah, shit...

LABEL: 0x64FA
STRING: I wonder if my face has "Ah, shit" written all over it right now.

LABEL: 0x6557
STRING: When I remained silent, Nana opened her mouth in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x6656
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x6664
STRING: "You know... you're not going to tell me you forgot about that, are you?"

LABEL: 0x6756
STRING: In fact, when I took Sycoe to the infirmary this morning, I promised her that I would go home with her after school.

LABEL: 0x6879
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x6887
STRING: "You know〜 You haven't been hanging out with us lately. If you can't go, why didn't you just tell me first? You're causing us trouble."

LABEL: 0x6A4E
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x6A5C
STRING: "Well, well, Nana, Metarou has many things to do too! Don't get mad, don't get mad〜"

LABEL: 0x6BF1
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x6BFF
STRING: "That's not the point, cancelling on the promised day is just the worst!"

LABEL: 0x6D46
STRING: In a bad mood, Nana made a "Hmph" with her nose, and left the classroom.

LABEL: 0x6E77
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x6E85
STRING: "Why's she so bitchy lately? Is it that time of the month?"

LABEL: 0x6F83
STRING: Yukimaru spoke up right after Nana was gone.

LABEL: 0x7086
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x7094
STRING: "Well, don't worry about it, I'll follow up. You've got things to do, right?"

LABEL: 0x7284
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x7292
STRING: "Oh, leave it to me. Bros gotta help each other out...!"

LABEL: 0x7384
STRING: He waved his hand placidly and headed for the door with a relaxed gait.

LABEL: 0x73E9
STRING: As usual, Yukimaru is a down to earth and reasonable guy...

LABEL: 0x743C
STRING: In the past, when Nana and I often clashed, this guy was always there to intervene.

LABEL: 0x74B5
STRING: Looking back, all I can really say is thank you to him. I had a good friend, I did.

LABEL: 0x75C0
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x75CE
STRING: "Kukuku... It's Sycoe-chan in the next class, right?"

LABEL: 0x76F5
STRING: As he leaves, Yukimaru turns around and blurts this nonsense.

LABEL: 0x77EE
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x77FC
STRING: "Well, do your best〜! I'm rooting for you!"

LABEL: 0x78EC
STRING: It... It's not like that! I objected.

LABEL: 0x795C
STRING: But no matter, he just gave me a quick wink and walked out of the classroom.

LABEL: 0x79FA
STRING: I'm not kidding, who could possibly like that ditzy girl... I thought for a moment.

LABEL: 0x7A6D
STRING: No matter how much I say she's not my lover, that's how the people around me perceive it.

LABEL: 0x7B00
STRING: Well, it can't be helped. Let them say whatever they want.

LABEL: 0x7DAC
STRING: On our way home, we stopped by the park. Sycoe and I were sitting side by side on the swings.

LABEL: 0x7E1B
STRING: In the park, small children were laughing and frolicking.

LABEL: 0x7E80
STRING: A few of them were running around and playing a game of tag.

LABEL: 0x7F8C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x7F9A
STRING: "...It's 'curse tag.'"

LABEL: 0x8111
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x811F
STRING: "When you touch someone, you spread the curse to them. It was popular back in elementary school, wasn't it?"

LABEL: 0x8218
STRING: According to her, it wasn't just an ordinary game of tag.

LABEL: 0x8283
STRING: Sycoe continues with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x836C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x837A
STRING: "At the time, I thought it was a bunch of crap."

LABEL: 0x8503
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x8511
STRING: "So I didn't really react to getting touched. I figured this was all just a game. There's no curse..."

LABEL: 0x8630
STRING: She's right.

LABEL: 0x8671
STRING: It's just a children's game, and there's no such thing as a curse. ...It's utterly ridiculous.

LABEL: 0x86F2
STRING: This is just tag with a different name, isn't it?

LABEL: 0x87F7
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x8805
STRING: "So... because of that, I must have been cursed to the very end."

LABEL: 0x890A
STRING: Having said that, she lowered her head despondently with a sour expression.

LABEL: 0x8A48
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x8A56
STRING: "...I have a little bit of regret."

LABEL: 0x8BDB
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x8BE9
STRING: "Because it's been so long since then, I think I've become really unhappy..."

LABEL: 0x8D9A
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x8DA8
STRING: "If I had infected someone else with the curse then, like everyone else... Would I not have been so unhappy?"

LABEL: 0x8EC1
STRING: In other words, the curse from the "curse tag" that she played as a child is still accumulating in her.

LABEL: 0x8F40
STRING: "That's why I'm unhappy now..." is what she's trying to say.

LABEL: 0x904D
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x905B
STRING: "In order for me to be happy, should I have blamed someone else for my unhappiness?"

LABEL: 0x915D
STRING: Sycoe stares at me with a serious face.

LIST.STRING: That stuff is just a game.

LABEL: 0x92A1
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x92AF
STRING: "Maybe I just wanted... a reason."

LABEL: 0x943A
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x9448
STRING: "It might be an irrational reason, but I want to say it's because of that."

LABEL: 0x95E9
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x95F7
STRING: "Something that shows that I wasn't born this way... That's all."

LABEL: 0x9798
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x97A6
STRING: "Yeah, so... if there's a way to break this curse..."

LABEL: 0x9933
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x9941
STRING: "I wonder if one day, I'll ever be normal... and free as everyone else."

LABEL: 0x9A6F
STRING: Ah, come on, this is too depressing!

LABEL: 0x9ABC
STRING: I let out a deep sigh before getting up from the swing.

LABEL: 0x9B1D
STRING: In such a situation, why don't we lift our moods by having dessert at a family restaurant?

LABEL: 0x9B94
STRING: When I put it to her, her eyes lit up.

LABEL: 0x9C97
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x9CA5
STRING: "Ah...!! Er, I... want to eat a banana crepe!"

LABEL: 0x9D9C
STRING: Yes, that's the spirit!

LABEL: 0x9DDB
STRING: Misfortune and bad luck are attracted to you because you're always looking backwards. That must be it.

LABEL: 0x9EE8
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x9EF6
STRING: "Ah! I'm drooling just thinking about it〜!"

LABEL: 0x9FE5
STRING: Hey, hey, are you a little kid? You've got it all over you. Just how much were you looking forward to it?

LABEL: 0xA062
STRING: Our favourite family restaurant is "Usatoria", and it's just a short walk from the park.

LABEL: 0xA0E5
STRING: It's a restaurant for poor students with all menu items being reasonably priced.

LABEL: 0xA160
STRING: Usually, I enjoy a wide variety of drinks at the drink bar, and then order just one dessert.

LABEL: 0xA1E7
STRING: Then it's settled. Let's head over there before it gets dark...

LABEL: 0xA25F
STRING: ─Thinking of that, at the very moment we left the park...

LABEL: 0xA2CE
STRING: Right in front of us, I could hear a car horn honking loudly.

LABEL: 0xA32C
STRING: I─

LABEL: 0xA3A7
STRING: I've gotta save Sycoe...!!

LABEL: 0xA3F0
STRING: With that one thought in mind, I immediately pushed her away with all my might.

LABEL: 0xA607
STRING: And right after that, my own body flew through the air in a big arc.

LABEL: 0xA682
STRING: I slammed into the ground─My neck, and hands... were bent in a weird way.

LABEL: 0xA6F3
STRING: Ah... humans are more fragile than we like to think.

LABEL: 0xA837
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xA845
STRING: "Metarou-kun...! Metarou-kun...!!!"

LABEL: 0xA92C
STRING: When I opened my eyes, Sycoe was running up to me.

LABEL: 0xAA29
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xAA37
STRING: "Nooo!! I don't want you to die, Metarou-kun...!!"

LABEL: 0xAB24
STRING: There's a warm liquid dripping from my head. This... is bad.

LABEL: 0xAB99
STRING: From the way she's reacting... I might really be a goner. I had thought I had a chance.

LABEL: 0xAC2A
STRING: I guess it's really that bad. Well, I can't really check for myself...

LABEL: 0xAD3B
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xAD49
STRING: "Why did you save me...!!? Someone like me...!"

LABEL: 0xAEDE
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xAEEC
STRING: "I wish I had died instead of Metarou-kun... Uuu, hic, sniff..."

LABEL: 0xB00A
STRING: Sycoe's face was already in a mess from all the crying.

LABEL: 0xB06D
STRING: I opened my mouth to answer, "Don't say that," but all that came out was a whoosh of air.

LABEL: 0xB0F0
STRING: Oh, I see... I guess my lungs gave out already.

LABEL: 0xB155
STRING: Damn, I can't even get in some witty last words.

LABEL: 0xB1B4
STRING: If possible, I had hoped I wouldn't see your face like this at the very end...

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Sacrifice」

LABEL: 0xB604
STRING: It was over in an instant.

LABEL: 0xB64B
STRING: Sycoe, who was supposed to be right next to me, disappeared.

LABEL: 0xB6A2
STRING: I froze, unable to comprehend what had happened.

LABEL: 0xB759
STRING: S-Sycoe...

LABEL: 0xB794
STRING: She was lying some distance away from me, hit by the car just now.

LABEL: 0xB805
STRING: I rushed over to her in a panic.

LABEL: 0xB84B
STRING: As I picked up her body, Sycoe smiled weakly.

LABEL: 0xB9F9
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xBA07
STRING: "Ah... hah, cough, urk... I-I'm... okay... I think."

LABEL: 0xBB0A
STRING: What a relief. She's still conscious...

LABEL: 0xBB55
STRING: She tried to stand up on her own, but stopped midway through.

LABEL: 0xBC6A
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xBDE1
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xBDEF
STRING: "It hurts...! I can't stand up..."

LABEL: 0xBEC8
STRING: Maybe it's a broken bone. Oh my god, I need to get her to a doctor right away!

LABEL: 0xBF49
STRING: When she saw me pull out my phone, she started to panic.

LABEL: 0xC040
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xC04E
STRING: "Eh?! M-Metarou-kun, are you calling... an ambulance?!"

LABEL: 0xC1DB
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xC1E9
STRING: "No, no, please, I can manage on my own! Dad will be angry with me again if I have to go to the hospital!"

LABEL: 0xC30E
STRING: Is this the time to be worrying about that?!

LABEL: 0xC359
STRING: As blood rushed to my head, Sycoe grabbed my arms tightly.

LABEL: 0xC45C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xC46A
STRING: "Look... See?! I'm fine! No problem...! Fit as a fiddle!"

LABEL: 0xC605
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xC613
STRING: "It's okay, it's okay! This is... probably, just a bone fracture, that's all!"

LABEL: 0xC721
STRING: Don't be silly! What kind of idiotic thing is she saying at a time like this?

LABEL: 0xC790
STRING: I ignored her trying to hold me back, and called the emergency services.

LABEL: 0xC806
STRING: Then, less than five minutes later, an ambulance arrived and took Sycoe to the hospital...

LABEL: 0xC87F
STRING: What a relief. Now Sycoe will be saved...

LABEL: 0xCB1D
STRING: Late at night, when everyone should be asleep.

LABEL: 0xCB6E
STRING: I'm sleeping in my room, wrapped in a tattered futon.

LABEL: 0xCBCB
STRING: I was awakened by the sound of broken plates coming from the living room.

LABEL: 0xCC28
STRING: ─What's going on at this time of night?

LABEL: 0xCC73
STRING: Did Mom and Dad come back, I wonder...

LABEL: 0xCCCC
STRING: The two of them always come home late.

LABEL: 0xCD11
STRING: Dad works overtime past 11pm, and Mom works night shifts.

LABEL: 0xCD8A
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xCD9C
STRING: "...What are you going to do now?! We don't even have any savings!"

LABEL: 0xCE0A
STRING: Wondering what's going on, I opened the sliding door a little and took a peek.

LABEL: 0xCE7B
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0xCE8D
STRING: "I can't help it! The terms were unfavourable, but I couldn't say no! There's nothing I can do about it!"

LABEL: 0xCF2A
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xCF3C
STRING: "If you did your job properly you wouldn't be restructured, would you?! If you did it well..."

LABEL: 0xCFDD
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0xCFEF
STRING: "What the hell...?! I was doing everything properly, I didn't do anything wrong!!!"

LABEL: 0xD070
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0xD082
STRING: "Besides, from now on you're just going to have make as much money as I do, aren't you?"

LABEL: 0xD109
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xD11B
STRING: "What the hell did you say...? You're trying to get me to work even more?! I'm already overloaded as it is!".

LABEL: 0xD1AE
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xD1C0
STRING: "Don't just rely on me. All you need is to get a new job as soon as possible, right!?"

LABEL: 0xD251
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0xD263
STRING: "What are you talking about?! I've done my very best for us up until now. Shouldn't I be entitled to a break for a bit!?"

LABEL: 0xD2E7
STRING: It's the kind of conversation that makes my head hurt.

LABEL: 0xD338
STRING: I couldn't take it any longer, so I closed the door.

LABEL: 0xD395
STRING: I crawled back under the futon and tried to figure out what had happened with my dumb brain.

LABEL: 0xD456
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xD464
STRING: "...What's going on at dad's work, I wonder. Restructuring... what's that?"

LABEL: 0xD4D7
STRING: I pulled out my phone and looked up the meaning of the word.

LABEL: 0xD530
STRING: It takes a lot of data bandwidth, so I'm usually careful not to use a lot of data. I only use it for times like this.

LABEL: 0xD5BF
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xD5CD
STRING: "I see, so Dad was forced to quit his job..."

LABEL: 0xD63B
STRING: This family's living expenses are provided by my father's salary.

LABEL: 0xD690
STRING: It's hard to imagine how big a loss it was to lose the breadwinner of the family, but...

LABEL: 0xD705
STRING: That conversation showed how serious a matter it was.

LABEL: 0xDA03
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0xDA44
STRING: A woman illuminated by the twinkling stars was talking with a girl.

LABEL: 0xDAC7
STRING: "Good evening, it has been a long time."

LABEL: 0xDB2A
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xDB38
STRING: "Good evening... I'm sorry to have entered your garden without permission.

LABEL: 0xDBCB
STRING: "That's all right. I've already informed the guards, you're free to come and go as you please."

LABEL: 0xDC58
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xDC66
STRING: "Thank you very much... I love this garden."

LABEL: 0xDCE5
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xDCF3
STRING: "There are all these beautiful flowers blooming... When I look at them, I feel at ease. Very much so."

LABEL: 0xDD8E
STRING: "Hehe, thank you. We have a first-rate gardener who takes care of it every day."

LABEL: 0xDE1D
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xDE2B
STRING: "Is that so. Amazing..."

LABEL: 0xDE8A
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xDE98
STRING: "I want to be the kind of person who can create such an amazing garden in the future."

LABEL: 0xDF1B
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xDF29
STRING: "...Eheh, it seems impossible for me though."

LABEL: 0xDF9C
STRING: "No, please do not say that. I'm sure you can make your dreams come true."

LABEL: 0xE021
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xE02F
STRING: "W-why do you think so? Someone like me...?"

LABEL: 0xE0A6
STRING: "Yes, because I can see you have such a beautiful twinkle in your eye."

LABEL: 0xE12F
STRING: "People who long for beautiful things will be able to create very beautiful things."

LABEL: 0xE1D6
STRING: "No matter how dirty the circumstances, as long as you never forget your longing. Then for sure..."

LABEL: 0xE25D
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xE26B
STRING: "What if I forget my longing...?"

LABEL: 0xE2DC
STRING: "It will be fine."

LABEL: 0xE329
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xE337
STRING: "But, I've been having trouble keeping up... I keep getting hurt, and strange things keep happening."

LABEL: 0xE3CC
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xE3DA
STRING: "I'm always causing trouble to Mom and Dad."

LABEL: 0xE457
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xE465
STRING: "I bring misery to the people around me..."

LABEL: 0xE4E4
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xE4F2
STRING: "I just want to disappear in secret, somewhere no one else knows. I don't want to make anyone unhappy."

LABEL: 0xE585
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xE593
STRING: "I mustn't have dreams, or longings. They shine too brightly for me, it's better for me to give them up.

LABEL: 0xE62A
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xE638
STRING: "It's for the best, for the sake of those who care about me, so...

LABEL: 0xE6CF
STRING: "I don't think anyone who cares about you would want that."

LABEL: 0xE76E
STRING: "You don't know it, but those people are surely wishing."

LABEL: 0xE803
STRING: "Wishing for you to embrace your happiness."
